idea-plugin.name: PlantArch Live Analyzer
idea-plugin.description:
Adds support for the PlantArch framework in IntelliJ IDEA. This plugin allows you to generate a clear and interactive architectural overview of your Java project within seconds. Key features:
  • Instant architecture visualization based on compiled class files
  • Integration with external analysis processes and PlantUML rendering
  • Dynamic diagram updates directly within the IDE
For documentation and more information, visit the official project site.
